mapper.select: select e.*,c.code_value rank_name,c2.code_value branch_name ,c3.code_value department_name from tbl_emp e left join tbl_org o on e.emp_no = o.emp_no left join tbl_code c on o.rank_code = c.code_category||c.code_num left join tbl_code c2 on o.branch_code = c2.code_category||c2.code_num left join tbl_code c3 on o.dept_code = c3.code_category||c3.code_num where e.emp_no = #{emp_no} and e.emp_pw = #{emp_pw}
